It is time that our tax reform stands and works for everyone, not just those at the top.
I will not support a tax plan that only consists of tax cuts for the wealthy on the backs of the middle class & does not grow the economy.
Meaningful reform must include a $ 1 trillion expansion of the earned income tax credit & promoting the middle class.
Any plan must include the closing of special interest & corporate loopholes to prevent companies from avoiding taxes.
While also making small businesses more competitive and promoting job growth, and ensuring large corporations are paying their fair share.
Shifting the tax burden from the corporate rate onto increased capital gains & dividends would hold corporations & shareholders accountable
While small businesses who are the engines of economic growth & job creation & can’t afford armies of accountants are paying higher rates.
Most corporations use their attorneys to find loopholes to pay an effective rate of 18.6 %
Our system incentivizes corporations to seek loopholes & transfer their income & profits overseas to avoid investing in America
Our corporate tax rate favors large corporations & creates a system that gives corporate America an unfair advantage over small businesses.
GOP thinks our problems can be solved by cutting taxes for the one %, & their wealth trickling down to the rest of America. It hasn’t worked
We need to transform our tax system, so that every American is paying their fair share. Need to alleviate the everyday stresses of  families
